entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Incorrect handling of null target in ReleaseJSOwnedObjectByGCHandle #107486
  • LOH in StringBuilder #107482
  • Intermittent issue while fetching windows default credentials using UseDefaultCredentials = true in HttpClientHandler #107480
    Future
  • Runtime crash caused by Thread.Join called on resurrected Thread #107473
  • Unhandled exception. System.EntryPointNotFoundException: Unable to find an entry point named 'CryptoNative_SslCtxRemoveSession' in shared library 'libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl' #107472
    Future
  • IConfigurationProvider.GetReloadToken nullable annotation #107470
    Future
  • Unable to Upgrade to MAUI Version of Xamarin App #107469
  • [browser][Windows] Chrome WBT timeout on helix if we update chrome #107466
    10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra] CoreCLR CI job cannot pull fedora-39-helix image #107455
  • Is System.Text.Json 8.0.4 version is backward compatible with 8.0.3 version #107451
  • [API Proposal]: Volatile read/write for new supported types of Interlocked exchange #107449
  • mono_gc_run_finalize iOS crash #107448
  • Test failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToLibraryImportFixerTests.PreserveSigFalseSignatureModified #107446
  • WriteXorExecute double mapping causes .NET apps to AV when native debuggers set breakpoints #107444
    10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Jiterpreter does not know which features are enabled on worker threads #107443
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `Interlocked.Read` generic API #107441
  • System.Text.Json analyzers should warn about using reflection when reflection is disabled #107440
  • Use transitive reference packages instead of explicit reference packages. #107439

Closed

  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #100273
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm] Determinism test failure #100508
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `AdvSimd.ShiftLeftLogicalWideningLower` #107173
    9.0.0
  • Rare failures can occur when SegmentResortChains races with coreclr!Thread construction #107467
    9.0.0
  • Source generators are not shipping symbols #107421
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests.Bind_T #107442
  • Adding OpenTelemetry instrumentation results in 15% RPS degradation #107158
    10.0.0
  • Cannot test on Arm64 : Could not copy crossgen2_publish apphost #107457
  • ToString("MMM") outputs September as Sept #107453
  • LoadAssemblyAndGetFunctionPointer doesn't reset the out function pointer on error #45601
    Future
  • DateTime.now alway return utc time in dotnet 8.0.1 #107399
  • Unable to resolve type: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostApplicationLifetime #104372
  • .NET 9 Blazor exception: Could not load type of field 'SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor.Internal.JSModuleInterop:moduleTask' ... #107454
  • [mono crash] mono runtime is crashing when new an object and mono main thread is in STATE_Blocking #107122
  • Build failure: ilc exited with code 139 #106293
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: #107445
  • Check a missing optimization opportunity assert failure. #55752
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' #106545
    9.0.0
  • [CET Debugging] User mode APC's on Windows x64 with CET enabled can cause a debug session to crash #74271
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests fails on CI #107381
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix module being set as tenured too early #107489
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Convert `WaitHandle` FCalls to QCalls #107488
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107487
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] fix hang when `prepare_to_change_heap_count` fails #107485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve error message when running `dotnet app.exe` #107484
    area-Host
  • JIT: Add simple late layout pass #107483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `BaseDomain` use in `LoaderAllocator` and event tracing helpers #107481
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Track that kmov instructions may write to GPR register #107476
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AltJit entries in DOTNETVariables list of testenvironment.proj #107475
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix EVP_MAC_CTX cleanup in one shot #107471
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #107464
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107461
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix feature detection on webworker #107452
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging][android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #107450
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix published crossgen2 crash #107447
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix thread static cleanup paths #107438
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Implement MONO_MEMORY_BARRIER in jiterpreter #107325
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #107333
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] ComponentModel threading fixes #107354
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 6.0.35
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107436
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix getting SSP for threadabort in funceval #107463
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix SegmentResortChains synchronization #107468
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Do not over-align code when JitAlignLoops=0 is set #107340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Fix bugs discovered by the fuzzer #107368
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [mono] Fix swizzle_mask type #107460
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • Track that kmov instructions may write to GPR register #107428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move pinned heap handle table from `BaseDomain` to `AppDomain` and make callers go through the `AppDomain` #107420
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add NrbfDecoderFuzzer #107385
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop compaction #107403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix EVP_MAC_CTX cleanup in one shot #107431
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Make Module::LoadAssembly return Assembly instead of DomainAssembly #107411
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make ComponentActivator.[LoadAssemblyAnd]GetFunctionPointer set initialize out pointer to 0 #107426
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Enable more BinaryFormatter tests #107408
    area-System.Runtime, test-enhancement, binaryformatter-migration
  • codeql fixes #107422
    area-Host
  • Disable ilasm tests for nativeaot test runs #107432
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • check in configurations #107012
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • unnecessary assert when GetHeap is called in wait_for_gc_done #107073
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Check CancellationToken before TimeSpan in TimeProviderTaskExtensions #107416
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Fix incorrect handle type array/count when FEATURE_SIZED_REF_HANDLES is not defined #107433
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Fixing 0 length issue with constructor #107427
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • WIP: segv handler #107417
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2532721 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Normalize `--` and case for options in src/tests/build.sh like we do in eng/build(-commons).sh #107425
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_SWITCH opcode in jiterpreter #107423
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    arch-wasm, community-contribution, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser
  • Remove ILLink support for field init substitutions #107380
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add a SearchValues implementation for values with unique low nibbles #106900
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Try to maintain fallthrough in `Compiler::fgSplitEdge` #107419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Overhaul Main Workflow Docs #107415
    documentation
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Add support disclaimer to data-formats.md #107341
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop canonicalization #107371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.113 #107259
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #107398
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.10
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [browser][host] Include system environment variables when resolving ASPNETCORE_URLS #107392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_NEWARR in jiterpreter #107430
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use SearchValues in Uri.CheckForUnicodeOrEscapedUnreserved #107357
    area-System.Net

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enhance `await` usage warnings with null coalescing operator #75010
  • Missing nullability warning for lambda with multiple ref-returns in `var` local declaration #75009
  • 'CSharpRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #75005

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35305.238 #75006
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35305.86 #75004

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround for InvalidOperationException thrown from EmitSolutionUpdateResults.GetAllDiagnosticsAsync #75011
    Interactive-Debugging, Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Remove the cancellation token from the calculation of InProgressState… #75007
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove the cancellation token from the calculation of InProgressState.LazyStaleCompilationWithGeneratedDocuments #75001
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Test attribute function pointer execution on net9 #74999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix IOperation debugging experience #74997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Support for per-file content exclusion in Rename Suggestions #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor: Signing in with a ClaimsPrincipal without claims stops any page from rendering #57734
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #57733
  • Perf improvement: json_spring, plaintext, plaintext_spring #57732
  • No interop methods are registered for renderer 1 #57730
  • Produce NuGet package READMEs #57729
  • Consider Reducing Ceremony for `EventCallback` Creation #57726
  • Provision to handle Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] error #57724
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #57723
  • Perf improvement: single_query, single_query #57722
  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.ReadAsync stops host from responding under load (from Crank) with body > 5000 bytes #57720

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #57651
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57717
  • When the Fluent UI Grid is very long, it cannot fully render the background color and grid lines for the hidden sections #57721
  • .Net9 Dev Bug adout MapStaticAssets : "System.InvalidOperationException: The file '_framework/blazor.boot.json.gz' could not be found." #57725
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, plaintext #57672
  • Perf improvement: https #57695
  • API #57719

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing` package README #57736
    area-mvc
  • Update ANCM file monitoring to hopefully avoid unneeded shutdowns #57735
    area-networking
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect` package README #57731
    area-security
  • #14423 User can verify multiple times with the same two factor token #57728
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine ProcessAsync_AwaitersUseTheResultOfExecutor #57568
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client` package README #57718
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Disable launching browser on Web API template #57682
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57613
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable NuGet Audit #57698
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When MinimumWidthRequest or MinimumHeightRequest are cleared on Windows, the old values stay in effect #24638
  • iOS Editor cursor above keyboard location can be inconsistent #24635
    Backlog
  • AutomationProperties.ExcludedWithChildren doesnt work as expected #24628
  • Window Title to be displayed in bold font face as it represents the App title #24627
    Backlog
  • Certificate pinning is not working in MAUI Android application #24626
  • Maui -Android certificate pinning using network-security-config ignore incorrect pin #24624
  • Hot reloading a TabBar page (without Shell) duplicates all tabs #24623

Closed

  • Unable to use Xcode #24632
  • can not start first app on maui on macOS #24617
  • HybridWebView: Add support for C# to invoke JavaScript methods #22303
    9.0-rc1
  • BindableLayout performance could be better #23135
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Windows: Entry with right aligned text keeps text jumping to the left during editing #24405
    Backlog
  • Shell, Navigation and Page instantiation #9300
    Backlog
  • Bindings are executed twice #10806
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Windows 11 Update KB5040527 breaks app startup #23963
  • Android Back Button Minimizes App When BlazorWebView Inside RefreshView #23740
  • SetCornerRadius of GradientDrawable doesn't work anymore #23267

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix layout when MinimumWidth/HeightRequest is removed on Windows #24639
  • Don't invalidate SuperView if not connected to Window #24637
  • [net9.0] Regenerate PublicAPIs based on main #24634
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Regenerate PublicAPIs based on main #24633
  • Update script to generate Public API filess #24631
  • Re-able the Localization steps and add new credentials #24629
    area-localization
  • [ci] Build with arcade #24625

Merged

  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, do-not-merge, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Improve Android device type check and improve UI Test cake scripts #24495
    area-testing
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Regenerate the shipped and unshipped API files #24613

Updated

  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Split off HandlerDoesNotLeak.DatePicker into its own UI test #24585
    area-testing
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest #24586
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area-xaml, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, t/perf
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView single item horizontal alignment issue when using ItemsLayout with a Footer. #24564
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • Fix Android FlyoutPage crash when changing orientation of tablet #24394
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix Android flyout button (burger) visibility not reevaluated when orientation changes #24469
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input, area-controls-editor

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find a Replacement Solution for the TableGenerator Tool #20107

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix rewriting testhost.deps.json #20104
